attributes.action: Grant an entry/tourist visa to Palestinian photographer/artist Hamde Abu Rahma.
attributes.additional_details:
Hamde's own video response to his latest visa denial. 
https://m.facebook.com/story.php?story_fbid=1703628009907569&id=100007811584708
attributes.background: Hamde Abu Rahma is an exceptionally talented photographer/artist from Ramallah. He has twice had a visa application denied by the UK home office despite support from MPs Tommy Sheppard,Joanna Cherry & others.He deserves the opportunity to showcase his important work here in the uk.

rejection.details: The duplicate petition, which you may want to consider supporting,  can be found here: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/131601
